location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Hubert Izaak Walton, Indo-European Telegraph Department, Kurrachee [Karachi] to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the ongoing work on the telegraph line and the need for another line via Gwadur [Gwadar], Bunder Abbas [Bandar Abbas], Shiraz and Teheran [Tehran] in order to join up with the Russian telegraph system.The letter goes on to discuss the delays that have been occuring in message going from England to Kurrachee [Karachi] via Constantinople [Istanbul] and the difficulties in checking lost or mutilated messages.
